“Look out, Tasmanian Devil, here comes Kate Sullivan to talk about the Election Accuracy movement in Maryland,” said WCBM Guest Radio Host Jeff MacDonald on July 5, 2024, on The Morning Show with Casey and Elliott.

Getting involved is contagious, and this is a movement to fix our election system. Hear Kate Sullivan, Founder of Secure the Vote Maryland and Maryland Chapter Leader for United Sovereign Americans discuss our elections and how they are corrupted.

“Look what we saw at the debate when that husk of a man who is allegedly representing us as President of the United States demonstrate how elections matter. Our group has filed a lawsuit…" continued Kate. The entire seven minutes she was on fire! Hear more Start at 2 hours, 38 minutes
